thread.title: The Two Minutes the Patriots Unleash Hell

author: Andrew Beaton
title: The Two Minutes the Patriots Unleash Hell
text:
Minneapolis
The Patriots looked sluggish. They were losing and playing at the other teamâ€™s pace. Their high-octane offense had scored only three points. Their crafty defense was getting fooled, and by quarterback Blake Bortles no less, in the AFC Championship game against Jacksonville.
Then New England did what it has done to so many teams... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
